mapper.select: SELECT A.feed_pk, feed_ctnt, feed_writedate, feed_userpk FROM feed ORDER BY feed_writedate DESC LIMIT 0, 5
SELECT feed_ctnt, feed_writedate, feed_userpk FROM feed WHERE feed_pk = #{feed_pk}
SELECT media_feedpk, media_url FROM media WHERE media_type = #{media_type}
SELECT a.hashtag_ctnt FROM hashtag AS a INNER JOIN hashtag_relation AS b ON a.hashtag_pk = b.htrel_feedpk
SELECT favorite_feedpk, COUNT(favorite_feedpk) AS favorite_cnt FROM favorite GROUP BY favorite_feedpk
SELECT comment_feedpk, COUNT(comment_ctnt) AS comment_cnt FROM comment ORDER BY comment_ctnt
SELECT bookmark_feedpk FROM bookmark WHERE bookmark_userpk = #{bookmark_userpk}
SELECT favorite_feedpk FROM favorite WHERE favorite_userpk = #{favorite_userpk}
